mapper.select: SELECT category1 as name, sum(buyCount) as value FROM react.product_naver GROUP BY category1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO react.product_naver (productId, title, image, category1, category2, category3, category4, buyCount, insertDate, updateDate) VALUES(#{item.productId}, #{item.title}, #{item.image}, #{item.category1}, #{item.category2}, #{item.category3}, #{item.category4}, 1, now(), now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE buyCount = buyCount + 1, updateDate = NOW()
